poemsDataJson.list_full: 世(よ)の中(なか)は 常(つね)にもがもな 渚(なぎさ)こぐ 海人(あま)の小舟(をぶね)の 綱手(つなで)かなしも
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: If only our world//Could be always as it is!//How moving the sight//Of the little fishing boat//Drawn by ropes along the bank.
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Yo no naka wa|Tsune ni mogamo na|Nagisa kogu|Ama no obune no|Tsuna-de kanashi mo
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: あまのをふねの つなてかなしも
poemsDataJson.author: 鎌倉右大臣(かまくらのうだいじん)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 漁師のさまを見て、世の無常を嘆く哀感
